name: Pescuit Pe Plajă
description:
instructions:

  • You see the bobber? Don’t hit Space.
  • The bobber disappeared? Hit Space.
  • Fishy-Indicator is in the red area? Don’t hit Space.
  • Fishy-Indicator is in the green or yellow area? Hit Space.
  • Get 16 points for Level 2!
  • Get 112 points for Level 3!
  • Get 256 points for Level 4!
  • Get 666 points for Level 5!
